member.name: M:ABB.API.Controllers.EmployeeController.AddEmployee(ABB.Entity.EmployeeEntity)
member.summary: Create a new employee. Not required to send employeeid property. send it as 0

member.name: M:ABB.API.Controllers.EmployeeController.UpdateEmployee(ABB.Entity.EmployeeEntity)
member.summary: Update an employee. Please provide a valid employeeid in the request body

member.name: M:ABB.API.Controllers.EmployeeController.DeleteEmployee(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete a specific employee by id
